data.actual_result: The user's note resets after closing & re-opening their profile. As well as any notes having been set on the app not correctly being reflected in the Overlay
data.expected_result: The user's note should remain and likewise notes already set from on the app should appear
data.short_description: Cannot set Notes on users in the Overlay
data.steps_to_repro: - Open the Overlay in a game - Open the profile of a user in the Overlay and add a note - Close their profile and then re-open it
